originalTitle: US YouTube star IShowSpeed to get Ghanaian passport as Africa tour ends
title: US YouTube star IShowSpeed to get Ghanaian passport as Africa tour ends
content: Ghana's foreign minister says the influencer is a "worthy ambassador", but some Ghanaians criticised the move.

originalTitle: The model who moved to Ghana and wrapped her prosthetic leg in its famous fabric
title: The model who moved to Ghana and wrapped her prosthetic leg in its famous fabric
content: Abena Christine Jon'el left the US and now aims to raise the profile of people with disabilities in Ghana.

originalTitle: Ex-Nigeria oil minister in bribery trial spent £2m at Harrods, court hears
title: Ex-Nigeria oil minister in bribery trial spent £2m at Harrods, court hears
content: Diezani Alison-Madueke is accused of accepting bribes from industry figures interested in Nigerian government contracts, a court in London has heard.

originalTitle: Al-Sharaa meets Putin as Russia seeks to secure military bases in Syria
title: Al-Sharaa meets Putin as Russia seeks to secure military bases in Syria
content: Kremlin has not indicated whether it will agree to al-Sharaa's repeated requests for Bashar al-Assad's extradition.

originalTitle: What we know about plane crash that killed Ajit Pawar
title: What we know about plane crash that killed Ajit Pawar
content: Authorities in India say they're investigating the cause of a plane crash that killed Ajit Pawar

originalTitle: China pitches itself as a reliable partner as Trump alienates US allies
title: China pitches itself as a reliable partner as Trump alienates US allies
content: UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer is the latest US ally to visit Beijing, pursuing renewed ties and trade deals.

originalTitle: Trump warns Iran 'time is running out' as US military builds up in Gulf
title: Trump warns Iran 'time is running out' as US military builds up in Gulf
content: The US president, who has previously vowed to "rescue" protesters in Iran, says a "massive Armada" is on the way to the country.

originalTitle: 'I don't let bullies win,' says US congresswoman Omar after substance thrown at her
title: 'I don't let bullies win,' says US congresswoman Omar after substance thrown at her
content: The Minnesota Democrat was uninjured and continued to speak at her event, after being sprayed with an unidentified liquid.

originalTitle: Amazon confirms 16,000 job cuts after accidental email
title: Amazon confirms 16,000 job cuts after accidental email
content: The technology giant confirmed the redundancies hours after it told staff in an email sent in error.

originalTitle: Six English clubs, one huge night - all to play for in Champions League
title: Six English clubs, one huge night - all to play for in Champions League
content: With the league phase of the Champions League almost over, which teams can join Arsenal and Bayern Munich in the top eight?

originalTitle: West Ham sign winger Traore from Fulham
title: West Ham sign winger Traore from Fulham
content: West Ham sign winger Adama Traore from Fulham on a permanent basis for an undisclosed fee.

originalTitle: Ward-Prowse set for West Ham departure after not playing under Nuno
title: Ward-Prowse set for West Ham departure after not playing under Nuno
content: West Ham midfielder James Ward-Prowse is expected to undergo a medical with Burnley on Wednesday as he closes in on a loan move.
